column3: Create a incorrect or junk file that does not have articles

Select 'Browse' and select the package zip file

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/develop/doajtest/preservation_upload_test_package/invalid_article.zip

column4: A flash message appears at the top of the screen: File uploaded and waiting to be processed.
Upload status is shown in 'History of uploads' with status pending

column3: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data).  If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

column4: upload status in 'History of uploads' to 'processing failed' and the 'Notes' displays 'No articles found in the package. Invalid package uploaded'
